abstract: Federal Judge James E Boasberg orders stop to Obama administration's immigrant detention policy at border whether or not they had applied for asylum.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge ruled that the Obama administration must stop holding women and children caught trying to enter the country illegally whether or not they had applied for asylum.

headline.main: Judge Orders Stop to Detention of Families at Borders
headline.print_headline: Detention of Families at Borders Is Halted

snippet: A federal judge ruled that the Obama administration must stop holding women and children caught trying to enter the country illegally whether or not they had applied for asylum.
